name: Mostafa Milani
content: Mostafa Milani Mostafa Milani Home Students Projects Publications Courses mostafa.milani@uwo.ca Office: Middlesex College 384 Tel: 519-661-2111 ext. 85968 Welcome! I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Western Ontario. My research focuses on data management and databases, with a particular interest in helping database users access, understand, and clean data. Before joining Western, I was a Postdoctoral Research Fellow at the University of British Columbia, where I worked with Dr. Rachel Pottinegr. Previously, I held a postdoctoral position at McMaster University and worked with Dr. Fei Chiang. I earned my Ph.D. from Carleton University under the supervision of Dr. Leopoldo Bertossi. Research interests: Data quality and cleaning Data privacy Data provenance Data integrity and fairness Professional activities: Program committee member: SIGMOD 22, 24-26 ICDE 25 and 26 VLDB 23, 24, and 26 FAccT 24 and 25 CASCON 22-25 Review board: VLDB Journal I am looking for Ph.D. students to join my group. If you are interested in data management and databases, please send me your resume and research statement.
